meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inconceivable.
meanings.sent1: The inconceivablenesses of outer space amazed the students.
meanings.sent2: Scientists struggle to comprehend the inconceivablenesses of quantum mechanics.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked that the inconceivablenesses of math made his head spin.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were filled with the inconceivablenesses of a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the inconceivablenesses of the universe in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The book delved into the inconceivablenesses of time travel.
meanings.sent2: The mysteries of the universe are filled with inconceivablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The children's story was full of whimsical inconceivablenesses.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a tapestry woven with the inconceivablenesses of human potential.
meanings.sent5: The movie's plot twists were inconceivablenesses that kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
